Models¶

#Base Classes for Subject Models #++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ # #.. autoclass:: base_consented_uuid_model.BaseConsentedUuidModel # :members:

Consent Base Classes¶

Consent Catalogue¶

Each consent type is catalogued by name, version and time period. For each catalogued consent, the models it covers are listed. When a subject_instance is saved, ModelForm clean() and Model save() check that the model class of the subject instance is named in the list of models covered by the subject’s consent.
